table.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

tr.style: border: 1px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

a.title: The logical name of the element

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

a.title: Minimum and Maximum # of times the element can appear in the instance

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px; width: 100px

a.title: Reference to the type of the element

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

a.title: Health conditions affecting the health of the patient and are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter.

tr.td:
Elements defined in Ancestors:header, presentedForm
Condition model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference

tr.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px; vertical-align: top; background-color: #F7F7F7

td.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: #F7F7F7; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; white-space: nowrap; background-image: url(tbl_bck10.png)

a.title: Identification of the condition, problem or diagnosis. Coded values are preferable, but text should be accepted.

tr.td:
Identification of the condition, problem or diagnosis. Coded values are preferable, but text should be accepted.
Binding Description: (preferred): 1.3.6.1.4.1.12559.11.10.1.3.1.42.5 eHDSIIllnessandDisorder (ICD-10, used in MH@EU); 1.3.6.1.4.1.12559.11.10.1.3.1.42.63 eHDSIRareDisease (OrphaCodes, used in MH@EU); ICD-11; SNOMED CT

tr.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px; vertical-align: top; background-color: white

td.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; white-space: nowrap; background-image: url(tbl_bck10.png)

a.title: Assertion about the certainty associated with a diagnosis. Diagnostic and/or clinical evidence of condition.

tr.td:
Assertion about the certainty associated with a diagnosis. Diagnostic and/or clinical evidence of condition.
Binding Description: (example): 1.3.6.1.4.1.12559.11.10.1.3.1.42.64 eHDSICertainty (HL7, used in MH@EU); http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-ver-status (HL7, required in HL7 FHIR)

a.title: This field includes free text if the resolution circumstances are not already included in other fields such as surgical procedure, medical device, etc., e.g. hepatic cystectomy (this will be the resolution circumstances for the problem 'hepatic cyst' and will be included in surgical procedures).

td.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: #F7F7F7; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px

tr.td: Describes the reason for which the status of the problem changed from current to inactive (e.g. surgical procedure, medical treatment, etc.).

a.title: The clinical status of the condition

tr.td:
The clinical status of the condition
Binding Description: (preferred): 1.3.6.1.4.1.12559.11.10.1.3.1.42.15 eHDSIStatusCode (SCT, used in MH@EU); http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-clinical (HL7, required in HL7 FHIR)

tr.td:
Subjective assessment of the severity of the condition.
Binding Description: (preferred): 1.3.6.1.4.1.12559.11.10.1.3.1.42.13 eHDSISeverity (SCT, used in MH@EU); http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-severity (SCT, Preferred in HL7 FHIR); Basic 3-Value Severity Scale Value: Mild-Moderate-Severe http://id.who.int/icd/entity/681697550 (ICD-11)

tr.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px; vertical-align: top; background-color: white

td.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; white-space: nowrap; background-image: url(tbl_bck10.png)

td.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: #F7F7F7; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; white-space: nowrap; background-image: url(tbl_bck00.png)

a.title: External Resource which may be specifically related to the problem, for example a link between a rare disease problem and the corresponding guidelines.

tr.td: External Resource which may be specifically related to the problem, for example a link between a rare disease problem and the corresponding guidelines.

description.value: Health conditions affecting the health of the patient and are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter.

short.value: Condition model

definition.value: Health conditions affecting the health of the patient and are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter.

short.value: Common header for all patient-related data

definition.value: Common header for all patient-related data
Patient/subject information

short.value: Business identifier for the object

definition.value: Business identifier for the object
Resource authoring details
Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: Date and time of authoring/issuing

definition.value: Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

short.value: Status of the resource

definition.value: Status of the resource

short.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Business version of the resource.

short.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

definition.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document
